items.name: Accomplice's Gloves
items.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

items.name: Adaptive Helm
items.desc:
Gain an additional 15% Mana from all sources. The holder gains an additional bonus based on their Role:

Tanks and Fighters: Gain 45 Armor and Magic Resistance.

Other Roles: Gain 10% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

items.name: Aegis of the Legion
items.desc:
Combat start: Grant 25% Attack Speed and 15 Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies in the same row, and all allies behind them for 12 seconds.

[Support item]

items.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
items.desc:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

items.name: Banshee's Veil
items.desc:
Combat start: Grant the holder and allies within 1 hexes in the same row immunity to crowd control and 25% Attack Speed for 18 seconds.

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Bastion Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Bastion trait.
Gain 15% of Armor as Attack Damage.
Gain 15% of Magic Resistance as Ability Power.

items.name: Battle Academia Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Battle Academia trait, and 120 Health and 6% Damage Amp per %i:set14AmpIcon%.

items.name: B.F. Sword
items.desc: %i:scaleAD% +10% Attack Damage

items.name: Blacksmith's Gloves
items.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Ornn Artifacts.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

items.name: Blighting Jewel
items.desc:
Dealing magic damage reduces the target's Magic Resist by 2. If their Magic Resist is 0, grant the holder 2 Mana instead.

Ability damage can only trigger on each enemy once every 0.5 seconds.

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.desc: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

items.name: Blue Buff
items.desc: Gain 10% additional Attack Damage and Ability Power from all sources.

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.desc:
Gain 9% max health.

Take 5% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

items.name: Chain Vest
items.desc: %i:scaleArmor% +20 Armor

items.name: Chalice of Power
items.desc:
Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power and 10 Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

[Support item]

items.name: Corrupt Vampiric Scepter
items.desc:
Attacks deal an additional 60% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage and heal the holder for the damage dealt.

The holder cannot cast their Ability or gain Mana.

items.name: Crownguard
items.desc:
Combat Start: Gain a 25% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.

When the Shield expires, gain 25% Ability Power.

items.name: Radiant Crownguard
items.desc:
Combat Start: Gain a 50% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.

When the Shield expires, gain 50% Ability Power.

items.name: Crown of Demacia
items.desc:
If the holder is a Tank, regenerate 3-21% maximum Health every 2 seconds (based on stage). Otherwise, gain 10% %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power every 2 seconds instead.

If the holder of this item dies, you instantly lose the fight.

You can remove this item by benching the holder.

items.name: Crystal Gambit Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Crystal Gambit trait.

items.name: Crystalline Reinforcements
items.desc: Your team gains 1000 health. Whenever a unit dies, a crystalline copy one star level lower joins the fight!

items.name: Dawncore
items.desc: Reduce the holder's max Mana by 10. Subsequent spellcasts reduce max Mana by 10%, to a minimum of 10.

items.name: Deathfire Grasp
items.desc: Combat start: Blast the current target for 40% of their max Health as magic damage. Repeat this every 13 seconds.

items.name: Determined Investor
items.desc: After dying during combat 8 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and %i:goldCoins% 5 gold.

items.name: Diamond Hands
items.desc: Once per combat: At 50% Health, become invulnerable for 1.5 seconds and grant %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

items.name: Dragon's Claw
items.desc:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 2.5% max Health.

items.name: Edgelord Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Edgelord trait.
Dealing physical damage to an enemy reduces their Armor by 2.

items.name: Evenshroud
items.desc:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

items.name: Radiant Evenshroud
items.desc:
30% Sunder enemies within 3 hexes. Gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 20 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

items.name: Executioner Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Executioner trait.
Attacks and Abilities that critically strike deal 20% bonus true damage over 3 seconds.

items.name: Protector's Vow
items.desc:
Combat Start: Gain 20 Mana.

At 40% Health, gain 15 Mana and a Shield equal to 20% max Health.

items.name: Radiant Protector's Vow
items.desc:
Combat Start: Gain 40 Mana.

At 40% Health, gain 30 Mana and a Shield equal to 40% max Health.

items.name: Fishbones
items.desc: The holder's attacks target random enemies.

items.name: Flickerblades
items.desc: Attacks grant 6% stacking Attack Speed. Every 5 attacks also grant 2% Attack Damage and 2% Ability Power.

items.name: Forbidden Idol
items.desc: Shields have 50% of their value converted to max Health instead.

items.name: Tactician's Crown
items.desc:
Your team gains +1 max team size.

10% chance to drop 1 gold when you win combat.

items.name: Frying Pan
items.desc: ...why else would it be here?

items.name: Gambler's Blade
items.desc:
Grant %i:scaleAS% 1% bonus Attack Speed per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% 30 gold).

Each attack has a 6% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

Gold generated this game: ?

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Gambler's Blade
items.desc:
Grant %i:scaleAS% 2% bonus Attack Speed per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% 15 gold).

Each attack has a 10% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

Gold generated this game: ?

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.desc:

Each attack has a 7% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

- 15% Attack Damage and 15% Ability Power.
- 12% Omnivamp.

While above 50% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below 50% Health, double the Omnivamp.

items.desc: The holder gains the Heavyweight trait, and gains 150 max Health on takedown.

items.name: Horizon Focus
items.desc: Stunning an enemy causes lightning to strike them, dealing 30% of their max Health as magic damage.

Abilities can critically strike.

The holder gains 1% of their total Mana whenever they're hit by an attack.

Each cast restores 20% of the holder's max Health over 3 seconds.

items.name: Ionic Spark
items.desc:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 150% of the Mana spent

Gain an additional 30% Mana from all sources. The wearer gains an additional bonus based on their Role:

Tank/Fighter: Gain 100 Armor and Magic Resistance.

Marksman/Caster: Gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

items.desc: The holder gains the Juggernaut trait and 10% of other Juggernaut's max Health when they die.

Damage from attacks and Abilities 30% Sunder the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

The holder's first attack after each Ability cast deals ? bonus magic damage.

Damage increases based on Stage.

items.name: Lightshield Crest

Every 3 seconds, Shields the lowest percent Health ally for 70% of the holder's combined Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds.

On death grants this shield to all allies.

Combat start: The holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a 250 Shield, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist for 20 seconds.

[Support item]

items.name: Deathblade

items.desc: The holder gains the Luchador trait.

items.desc: Combat start: Gain 20% Ability Power every 5 seconds in combat.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second

items.name: Void Staff
items.desc:
Damage from attacks and Abilities 30% Shred the target for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

items.name: Warmog's Armor
items.desc: Gain 18% max Health.

items.name: Wit's End
items.desc:
Attacks deal ? bonus magic damage.

Heals the holder for 30% of all magic damage dealt.

Damage increases based on Stage.

items.name: Wraith Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Wraith trait.

items.name: Zeke's Herald
items.desc:
Combat start: Grant %i:scaleAS% 30% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

[Support item]

items.name: Zephyr
items.desc:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

Your team gains 2% Attack Speed.

[Support item]
[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Zz'Rot Portal
items.desc:
Combat start: Taunt.
On death, a Voidspawn arises, Taunting nearby enemies. The Voidspawn has massively reduced effectiveness when created by a summoned unit.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter

items.name: The Darkin Aegis
items.desc:
The holder gains the Darkin trait.

Every second, deal 1% of the holder's max Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes. When units die in the area, heal for 2% max Health.

items.name: The Darkin Bow
items.desc:
The holder gains the Darkin trait.

Every 10 attacks, fire an arrow that passes through the current target, dealing 500% Basic Attack Damage as physical damage, reduced by 33% per enemy hit.

items.name: The Darkin Scythe
items.desc:
The holder gains the Darkin trait.

Every 4 seconds, slash adjacent enemies for 200% Basic Attack Damage as physical damage. On takedown or when the holder dashes, slash again.

Dash Cooldown: 1.5 second

items.name: The Darkin Staff
items.desc:
The holder gains the Darkin trait.

For every 20 Mana spent, launch a tendril at enemies near the current target, dealing 50 magic damage.

Damage increases based on Stage

items.name: Ionia Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Ionia trait.

items.name: Void Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Void trait.

items.name: Noxus Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Noxus trait.

items.name: Zaun Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Zaun trait.

items.name: Bilgewater Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Bilgewater trait.

items.name: Freljord Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Freljord trait.

items.name: Demacia Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Demacia trait.

items.name: Yordle Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Yordle trait.

items.name: Arcanist Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Arcanist trait. On kill, refund 20% of the holder's max Mana.

items.name: Quickstriker Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Quickstriker trait. On takedown, dash to the nearest target and heal for 10% maximum Health.

items.name: Slayer Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Slayer trait. Upon dropping below 25% max Health, Gain 20 Mana and a 30% max Health Shield.

items.name: Vanquisher Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Vanquisher trait and a 3% chance to drop 1 gold on critical strikes.

Cooldown: 0.75 seconds
Gold generated this game: ?

items.name: Invoker Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Invoker trait. On cast, gain Ability Power equal to 10% of Mana spent.

items.name: Bruiser Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Bruiser trait. Every second, deal 2% of the holder's max Health as magic damage in a 1-hex radius.

items.name: Defender Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Defender trait.
Combat Start: Gain 35% more Armor OR Magic Resist from all sources, depending on whichever is higher.

items.name: Blackmarket Explosives
items.desc:
Every 5 seconds, deal 15 + 12% of damage dealt within the last 5 seconds as magic damage to current target and 2 nearest enemies.

Recommended holder: Fizz

items.name: Lucky Doubloon
items.desc:
On takedown, generate an additional 1 %i:scaleSerpents%. (Earned: ?)

Recommended holder: Gangplank

items.name: Zz'Rot Portal
items.desc:
Summon a large Voidspawn. Its strength increases with each Stage.

[Support item]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Gunslinger Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Gunslinger trait.
Dealing physical damage to an enemy reduces their Armor by 2.

items.name: Ixtal Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Ixtal trait.

items.name: Longshot Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Longshot trait and +1 Attack Range.

items.name: Disruptor Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Disruptor trait. Abilities deal 20% bonus magic damage over 3 seconds.

items.name: Piltover Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Piltover trait.

items.name: Warden Emblem
items.desc: The holder gains the Warden trait. When a Shield on the holder breaks, heal them for 30% of the Shield's initial value.

items.name: Aegis of Dawn
items.desc:
Every 2.5 seconds, steal 5 Armor from enemies within 1-hex and heal 15% of the holder's Armor.

If Aegis of Dusk is also equipped, trigger this item's effect every 1.25 seconds instead.

Healing increases based on Stage.

items.name: Aegis of Dusk
items.desc:
Every 2.5 seconds, steal 5 Magic Resist from enemies within 1 hex and deal 15% of the holder's Magic Resist as magic damage.

If Aegis of Dawn is also equipped, trigger this item's effect every 1.25 seconds instead.

Damage increases based on Stage.

items.name: Cappa Juice
items.desc: The holder dons a Hat on each takedown. The holder gains 1% Attack Damage and Ability Power per Hat. On death lose 20% of all Hats. (Hats: ?)

items.name: Eternal Pact
items.desc:
Combat start: Form a pact with the highest Health allied champion, if they die, gain 10 Mana regen and 40% Ability Power.

When the ally uses their ability, gain 6 Mana. Every 6 seconds, shield your ally for 150% of the holder's Ability Power.

items.name: Hellfire Hatchet
items.desc: Attacks deal 2% of the holder's max Health as bonus physical damage. For every 1% missing Health, gain 1% Attack Speed.

items.name: Lesser Mirrored Persona
items.desc:
Share 15% of the holder's bonus Attack Damage, Ability Power, Attack Speed, Armor, Magic Resist, and Health with other Mirrored Persona holders.

Can't be Reforged
Unique: one per champion

items.name: Mending Echoes
items.desc: Increase healing on the holder by 25%. When the holder gives or receives a heal, grant 40% of the heals value to the lowest health ally as well.

items.name: Mirrored Persona
items.desc:
Every 6 player combats gain a lesser copy of Mirrored Persona (?/6).

Share 15% of the holder's bonus Attack Damage, Ability Power, Attack Speed, Armor, Magic Resist, and Health with other Mirrored Persona holders.

Can't be Reforged, Lesser copies do not produce copies.
Unique: one per champion

items.name: Shadow Puppet
items.desc:
Spawn a clone that copies the holder's items. The clone has 60% max Health and deals 40% damage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Void Gauntlet
items.desc:
Combat start: Store 30% max Health and 2.5% more every second. On death, unleash the stored Health as magic damage split between enemies within 4-hexes.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Cutthroat's Cutlass
items.desc:
Damaging enemies causes them to Bleed, dealing an additional 35% damage over 4 seconds.

Recommended holder: Gangplank

items.name: Brigand's Dice
items.desc: Immediately re-roll your shop and fill it with Bilgeater champions.

items.name: Captain's Brew
items.desc:
Attacks and Abilities Burn and Chill enemies for 2 seconds.

Recommended holder: Twisted Fate

items.name: Dead Man's Dagger
items.desc:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% Health. On kill, gain 10% Attack Damage and 10% Ability Power.

Recommended holder: Graves

items.name: Dreadway Cannon
items.desc:
NYI
Every 4 seconds, launch cannonballs at the bearer's target, dealing damage equal to 50% of the damage they took over the last 4 seconds.

items.name: First Mate's Flintlock
items.desc:
Every second during combat, gain 3% Attack Damage and 3% Attack Speed.

Recommended holder: Miss Fortune

items.name: Barknuckles
items.desc:
While above 50% Health, double the Armor and Magic Resist bonuses from this item.

Every 4 seconds, deal magic damage equal to 50% of current total Armor and Magic Resist to the 2 nearest enemies.

Recommended holder: Nautilus

items.name: Haunted Spyglass
items.desc:
NYI
Once per fight, after 3 takedowns, summon the ghost of the Dreadway, dealing 650%(%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a 3-hex radius.

items.name: Captain's Hat
items.desc: NYI The bearer becomes the Captain! Grant allies (a really cool effect) while the bearer is alive.

items.name: Pile O' Citrus
items.desc:
Every 7 seconds, heal 15% max Health and shed all negative effects. After 15 seconds, gain 10 %i:scaleSerpents%.

Recommended holder: Illaoi

items.name: 90 Caliber Nets
items.desc: Stun the 3 enemies who have dealt the most damage for 2 seconds.

items.name: Acceleration Gate
items.desc: After casting, Piltover units restore 35% of their max Mana over 2 seconds.

items.name: Armor Nullifier
items.desc: Piltover units deal 25% more damage, increased to 45% against Tanks.

items.name: Blast Shield
items.desc: All allies gain a 18% max Health Shield.

items.name: Continuum Cogs
items.desc: All allies gain 2 Mana Regen and 15 Ability Power.

items.name: Echo Engine
items.desc: For the rest of combat, repeat the effects of your other Modules every 7 seconds.

items.name: Electrical Overload
items.desc: Deal 50 + 10% max Health as true damage to all enemies.

items.name: E.M.P.
items.desc: Increase the Mana cost of all enemies' next cast by 15.

items.name: Gigantification Ray
items.desc: Piltover units gain 28% max Health and become much larger.

items.name: Kinetic Barrier
items.desc: Piltover units gain 65 Armor and 30 Magic Resist. If they've taken more magic damage than physical, they gain the opposite.

items.name: Magnetron Coil
items.desc: Piltover units gain 16% Damage Amp, increased by 1% for each cast from any Piltover unit this combat before this Module triggered.

items.name: Micro-Rockets
items.desc: Fire a barrage of missiles that repeats 66% of the damage dealt by Piltover units this combat as magic damage.

items.name: Mining Drill
items.desc: Gain 1 Gold or 1 Boot, randomly. (Repeats for every Piltover cast!)

items.name: Momentum Drive
items.desc: Cleanse all allied crowd control effects. Your team gains 50% Tenacity.

items.name: Overclocked Capacitors
items.desc: Grant your team 25% Attack Speed.

items.name: Superior Lifeform
items.desc: Summon a robot copy of your 2 strongest Piltover units. They have 40% of the original's Health and deal 50% as much damage.

items.name: Tuned Oscillator
items.desc: Increase your team's Healing and Shielding by 28%.

items.name: Unstable Core
items.desc: If Piltover units have cast at least 10 times this combat, deal 30% max Health true damage to all enemies. Otherwise, deal 15%.

items.name: Adrenaline Modules
items.desc:
Gain 15% Damage Amp, increased by 1% after every 3 attacks.

Recommended users: Bel'Veth and Kai'sa

items.name: Iron Carapace
items.desc:
Gain 200 max Health. Gain Armor and Magic Resist equal to 0.6% of max Health.

Recommended users: Cho'Gath and Rift Herald

items.name: Leeching Nucleus
items.desc:
Heal the lowest Health ally for 15% of damage dealt. After damaging an enemy, steal 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power from them, up to 15 stacks from all sources.

Recommended users: Kog'Maw, Malzahar, and Kai'sa

items.name: Predator Instincts
items.desc:
Gain 20% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Every 9 seconds, cleanse crowd control effects and become untargetable for 1 second(s).

Recommended users: Rek'Sai and Bel'Veth

items.name: Royal Husk
items.desc:
Gain 200 Health. After dropping below 50% max Health, spawn a Voidling with 30% of this unit's max Health.

Recommended users: Cho'Gath and Rift Herald

items.name: Spitter Spines
items.desc:
After dealing 1000 damage, fire spikes at the 2 nearest enemies that deal 100 physical damage.

Recommended users: Rek'Sai, Malzahar, and Kai'sa

items.name: Upgrade!
items.desc: Upgrade a random item on your strongest Piltover unit to Radiant. They also gain 25% Attack Speed and 300 max Health.

items.name: Voltage Conduit
items.desc: Reduce the max Mana of Piltover units by 30%.

items.name: Realm Warp
items.desc:
Use on any champion to gain an emblem for each of their listed traits.

[Consumable - This item disappears when used.]

items.name: Kayn's Liberation
items.desc:
Place on Kayn to free him from Rhaast, permanently improving his Reaping Slash Ability to deal bonus damage at the start of combat.

[KAYN CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used and DESTROYS Rhaast's Embrace]

[Can only be used during the Planning Phase]

items.name: Rhaast's Embrace
items.desc:
Place on Kayn to force Rhaast to overtake him, permanently improving his Reaping Slash spell to heal him.

[KAYN CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used and DESTROYS Kayn's Liberation]

[Can only be used during the Planning Phase]

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Choncc's Rocket-Propelled Fist
items.desc:
Combat start: The farthest enemy is pulled into melee range and Stunned for 1.5 seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities
